param.name: mail_from
param.label: From Email
param.description: You can specify the email address that emails should be sent from. If you leave this blank, the default email will be used.

param.name: mail_from_name
param.label: From Name
param.description: You can specify the name that emails should be sent from. If you leave this blank, the emails will be sent from WordPress.

param.name: mailer
param.label: Mailer
param.description: You can send all WordPress emails via SMTP or the PHP mail() function.

param.name: mail_set_return_path
param.label: Set Reply Address
param.description: Set the reply address to match the From Email

param.name: smtp_host
param.label: SMTP Host
param.description: These options only apply if you have chosen to send mail by SMTP above.

param.name: smtp_port
param.label: SMTP Port
param.description: These options only apply if you have chosen to send mail by SMTP above.

param.name: smtp_ssl
param.label: Encryption
param.description: You can set security encryption if your server supports it.

param.name: smtp_auth
param.label: Authentication
param.description: If this is set to no, the values below are ignored.
